previous version of this contract used a different liquidation mechanism.","custom:security-contact":"security@example.com","details":"Handles the liquidation of unhealthy Vaults via Dutch Auctions. The price of collateral starts high and decays over time until a buyer intervenes. This model is inspired by MakerDAO's Clipper contract.","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. buy(uint256,uint256).details: This is an atomic function. The buyer pays SCC-USD and receives collateral in one transaction.

params._collateralToBuy: The amount of collateral the user wants to buy.

params._oracle: The address of the OracleManager contract.
params._sccUsdToken: The address of the SCC_USD token contract.
params.initialOwner: The address of the initial owner of the contract.

getCurrentPrice(uint256).details: Uses a simple linear decay model. Price halves over PRICE_DECAY_HALFLIFE.

returns._0: The current price of one unit of collateral in SCC-USD.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._vaultAddress: The address of the vault to liquidate.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DEBT_DUST().notice: A small portion of debt that can be left behind to avoid dust amounts during liquidation.

PRICE_DECAY_HALFLIFE().notice: The time in seconds it takes for the auction price to halve.

START_PRICE_MULTIPLIER().notice: Multiplier for the starting price of collateral in an auction (e.g., 150 means 150%).

auctions(uint256).notice: Mapping from auction ID to its Auction struct.

buy(uint256,uint256).notice: Buys collateral from an ongoing Dutch auction.

getCurrentPrice(uint256).notice: Calculates the current price of collateral in an auction.

oracle().notice: The OracleManager contract used to fetch collateral prices.

sccUsdToken().notice: The SCC_USD token contract, used for debt and payments.

startAuction(address).notice: Starts a Dutch auction for an unhealthy vault.

vaultToAuctionId(address).notice: Mapping from vault address to its active auction ID.
